FR / EN

Bouteka

Built in 2021

https://bouteka-v2.netlify.app/
React WooCommerce Sass Lumen REST

TL ; DR

⚠️ Project in progress. The current state of the site is online but many parts are not yet finished and may contain some bugs. ⚠️

This project is my bachelor final project. It consists in developing an innovative interface for an e-commerce website currently in production and running with WooCommerce. The data is retrieved through the WooCommerce API and the UI is built with React and quite a lot of CSS.
